arStrings.szText: When you cast a Skill, you heal for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%1|]{/c} Life. Double this bonus while below {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Life.
Casting a Skill heals you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%1|]{/c} Life, doubled while below {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Life.
